Succeed.definition: to come next after another in office or position 2 a

1.definition: to follow in sequence and esp. immediately

2 a.definition: to take something by succession [to his mother's estate]

sub_terms.b: to acquire the rights, obligations, and charges of a decedent in property comprising an estate [the heir, who accepts, is considered as havingto the deceased from the moment of his death ""]

2 a.ed: to the deceased from the moment of his death "

2.definition: to come after as heir or successor
